verbose_text: Increasing evidences indicate that both KIR2DL2/L3 and KIR2DL1, in addition to their ability to discriminate between C1 and C2 epitopes, bind numerous peptide / HLA-C combinations retaining a degree of peptide selectivity.
evidence: KIR2DL2/L3 and KIR2DL1, in addition to their ability to discriminate between C1 and C2 epitopes, bind numerous peptide/HLA-C
